problem.markdown:
1. Time period of the structure changes when the initial conditions. () True (x) False
2) Time period is inversely proportional to mass. () True (x) False
3) Damping increases amplitude of the vibration. () True (x) False
4) Value of time period depends on mass. (x) True () False
5) Two structures with different masses and stiffnesses can have same time period. (x) True () False
problem.p: 1. Time period of the structure changes when the initial conditions.
2) Time period is inversely proportional to mass.
3) Damping increases amplitude of the vibration.
4) Value of time period depends on mass.
5) Two structures with different masses and stiffnesses can have same time period.
